xmp_schema.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt_description=IPTC Extension is a standard to extend the set of IPTC Core fields. It provides new additional metadata and it refines some of the existing ones.
xmp_schema.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt_label=IPTC Extension Properties

xmp_property.name: AddlModelInfo
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AddlModelInfo_description=Enter information like ethnicity or other details about the model(s) in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AddlModelInfo_label=Additional Model Info

xmp_property.name: ArtworkOrObject
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/ArtworkOrObject_description=Enter details about artwork or objects shown in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/ArtworkOrObject_label=Artwork or Object

xmp_property.name: OrganisationInImageCode
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/OrganisationInImageCode_description=Enter an identifier for the controlled vocabulary, then a colon, and finally the code from the vocabulary assigned to the organisation shown in this image (e.g. nasdaq:companyA)
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/OrganisationInImageCode_label=Code of Featured Organisation

xmp_property.name: CVterm
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/CVterm_description=Enter an identifier for the controlled vocabulary, then a colon, and finally the code from the vocabulary assigned to the term
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/CVterm_label=Controlled Vocabulary Term

xmp_property.name: LocationShown
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/LocationShown_description=Enter the details about a location which is shown in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/LocationShown_label=Location Shown

xmp_property.name: ModelAge
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/ModelAge_description=Enter the age of the human model(s) at the time this image was made
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/ModelAge_label=Model Age

xmp_property.name: OrganisationInImageName
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/OrganisationInImageName_description=Enter the name of the organisation which is featured by this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/OrganisationInImageName_label=Name of Featured Organisation

xmp_property.name: PersonInImage
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/PersonInImage_description=Enter the name of the person shown in this image
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/PersonInImage_label=Person Shown

xmp_property.name: DigImageGUID
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/DigImageGUID_description=Globally unique identifier for the item. It is created and applied by the creator of the item at the time of its creation. This value shall not be changed after that time
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/DigImageGUID_label=Digital Image Identifier

xmp_property.name: DigitalSourceType
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/DigitalSourceType_description=Select one of the values for identifying the type of the source of the digital image from the controlled vocabulary
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/DigitalSourceType_label=Digital Source Type

xmp_choice.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/DigitalSourceType/1=Original digital capture of a real life scene
$$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/DigitalSourceType/4=Digitised from a print on non-transparent medium

xmp_property.name: Event
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/Event_description=Enter the name or description of the event where this image was taken
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/Event_label=Event

xmp_property.name: RegistryId
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/RegistryId_description=Enter IDs for this image and the registry issuing the image ID
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/RegistryId_label=Registry Entry

xmp_property.name: LocationCreated
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/LocationCreated_description=Enter the details about a location where this image was created
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/LocationCreated_label=Location Created

xmp_property.name: MaxAvailHeight
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/MaxAvailHeight_description=Enter the maximum available height in pixels of the original photo from which this photo has been derived by downsizing
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/MaxAvailHeight_label=Max. Available Height

xmp_property.name: MaxAvailWidth
xmp_property.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/MaxAvailWidth_description=Enter the maximum available width in pixels of the original photo from which this photo has been derived by downsizing
xmp_property.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/MaxAvailWidth_label=Max. Available Width

xmp_type.name: ArtworkOrObjectDetails
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/ArtworkOrObjectDetails_label=Artwork or Object in the Image Details
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/ArtworkOrObjectDetails_description=A structured datatype for details about artwork or an object in an image. Includes a Copyright Notice, a Creator, a Date Created, a Source, a Source Inventory Number and a Title.

xmp_field.name: AOTitle
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOTitle_label=Title
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOTitle_description=Enter the verbal and human readable name of the artwork or object in this image

xmp_field.name: AODateCreated
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AODateCreated_label=Date created
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AODateCreated_description=Enter the date and optionally the time when the artwork or object in this image was created

xmp_field.name: AOCreator
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOCreator_label=Creator
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOCreator_description=Enter the name of the artist who has created artwork or an object in this image

xmp_field.name: AOSource
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOSource_label=Source
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOSource_description=Enter the name of the organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in this image for inventory purposes

xmp_field.name: AOSourceInvNo
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOSourceInvNo=Source inventory number
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOSourceInvNo_description=Enter the inventory number issued by the organisation or body holding and registering the artwork or object in this image

xmp_field.name: AOCopyrightNotice
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOCopyrightNotice_label=Copyright notice
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/AOCopyrightNotice_description=Enter any necessary copyright notice for claiming the intellectual property for artwork or an object in this image

xmp_type.name: LocationDetails
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/LocationDetails_label=Location Details
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/LocationDetails_description=A structured datatype for details of a location. It includes a Sublocation, a City, a Province or State, a Country (Name and ISO-Code) and a World Region.

xmp_field.name: ProvinceState
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/ProvinceState_label=Province/State
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/ProvinceState_description=Enter the name of the Province or State

xmp_field.name: CountryCode
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/CountryCode_label=Country ISO-Code
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/CountryCode_description=Enter the 2 or 3 letter ISO 3166 Country Code of the Country

xmp_field.name: WorldRegion
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/WorldRegion_label=World Region
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/WorldRegion_description=Enter the name of the World Region

xmp_type.name: RegistryEntryDetails
xmp_type.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/RegistryEntryDetails_label=Registry Entry Details
xmp_type.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/RegistryEntryDetails_description=A structured datatype for an entry in a registry, includes the id issued by the registry and the registry's id

xmp_field.name: RegOrgId
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/RegOrgId_label=Organisation Identifier
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/RegOrgId_description=Enter the identifier for the registry which issued the corresponding Registry Image ID

xmp_field.name: RegItemId
xmp_field.label: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/RegItemId_label=Item Identifier
xmp_field.description: $$$/xmp/Iptc4xmpExt/RegItemId_description=Enter the unique identifier created by a registry and applied by the creator of the digital image. This value shall not be changed after being applied
